full_summary:
### F6879-232502 DFO Columbier Island Helicopter Pad Remediation
#### Contract Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4235862956-Doc4235898346
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4235862956
* **Publication Date**: September 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 17, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Procurement Category**: CNST (Construction of buildings and structures)
* **Industry Codes**:
	+ UNVS10 (Industrial Buildings and Structures)
	+ UNSPS (91.52.240 — Industrial Buildings and Structures)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Newfoundland and Labrador
* **Contracting Entity**: [Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)](http://www.pwgs.gc.ca)
* **End User**: [Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)](http://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca)

### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites contractors to submit bids for the remediation of a helicopter pad at Columbier Island in Burnt Islands, Newfoundland and Labrador. The work consists of repairing and replacing structural members and connections of the existing helicopter pad. The scope of work includes providing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials.

**Bid Requirements**

* Confirmation of Bid (COB) must be submitted in electronic form
* Mandatory Pre-Bid Conference: None required
* Bid Security: Required during Phase Two

**Anticipated Contract Value**
The estimated value of this opportunity is between $100,001 to $500,000 CAD.

For more details, please refer to the official notice at [Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17589084?extsite=MTc1ODkwODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Contact Information**
For any questions or concerns, please contact Adam Beaumaster at [adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc(gc.ca)](mailto:adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
